name: Space Ballet
description:
Made for Community Jam 2015 in 72h

Story:

During an economic crisis in the far future, you are in charge of a small group of scavengers who are trying to collect crystals in order to sell them on the black market.

Objective:

Recolt as many crystals as possible on the rocket by mining the asteroids and then leave by clicking on the bottom left icon.

Be carefull you will have only 5 astronauts.

Controls:

  • Left click: Select unit/Actions
  • Left click & drag: Throw astronaut
  • Right click: Movement/Attack

Credit:

  • Antoine SEMBLAT (Twitter / Patreon)
  • Music by MachinimaSounds
